DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of using 2h-UG combined with FPG, AGEsP alone or in combination with FPG in diabetes screening in Chinese natural population
DOC.brief_title: Diabetes Screening in Chinese Natural Population
DOC.detailed_description: Using the WHO criteria as the golden standard，drawing the ROC curve of 2h-UG combined with FPG, AGEsP alone or in combination with FPG，calculating the area under the ROC curve.
DOC.criteria: 20~70 year old urban and rural residents; Volunteer to participate in this study and sign informed consent.
